banner.text: **PUZZLE:** Use your training, and the code blocks on the left, to swing the Lightsaber and hit the Jedi Training Remote sting beams.
banner.hint: Move the Lightsaber left and right with the Force Kit blocks

banner.text: With training you will become more powerful than you could possibly imagine.
